Rulings.Base: 1. Having 5 'Blackwing' monsters in your GY is only a condition for activation. It will work even if you don't have 5 or more cards in your GY when it resolves.

PSCT.Base: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack while you have 5 or more "Blackwing" monsters in your Graveyard: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
